name: Spooky Face
description:
I made this game during a game jam at my school, so it was the first time I got a chance to work in a team. The theme was phase so we made a game about ghosts who could phase through walls. It's a co-op platformer. Touch the orbs to be able to phase through different walls. The last level's door doesn't actually lead anywhere.

Instructions:

  • WASD for one player, arrow keys for other
  • Space bar makes both jump
  • Yellow floor panels makes you phase through certain walls
  • White floor panels remove the yellow power
  • Both buttons in a level have to have a player on them to activate
